property.name: maven.compile.compilerargs
property.label: maven.compile.compilerargs
property.description: Provides arguments to a compiler when maven.compile.fork is set to true

property.name: maven.compile.debug
property.label: maven.compile.debug
property.description: Specifies wether to include debugging information in the compiled class files; the default value is on. Used by the java:compile goal.

property.name: maven.compile.deprecation
property.label: maven.compile.deprecation
property.description: Specifies wether source should be compiled with deprecation information; the default value is off. Used by the java:compile goal.

property.name: maven.compile.encoding
property.label: maven.compile.encoding
property.description: Sets the encoding of the .java files being compiled. Corresponds to the encoding attribute for the ant javac task.

property.name: maven.compile.executable
property.label: maven.compile.executable
property.description: Names the program to be invoked as the java compiler. Corresponds to the executable attribute for the ant javac task.

property.name: maven.compile.fork
property.label: maven.compile.fork
property.description: Runs the compiler in a separate process. Corresponds to the fork attribute for the ant javac task.

property.name: maven.compile.memoryInitialSize
property.label: maven.compile.memoryInitialSize
property.description: Sets the initial memory size value passed to the VM when fork is set to true. Has no effect if fork is false. Corresponds to the memoryInitialSize attribute for the ant javac task.

property.name: maven.compile.memoryMaximumSize
property.label: maven.compile.memoryMaximumSize
property.description: Sets the maximum memory size value passed to the VM when fork is set to true. Has no effect if fork is false. Corresponds to the memoryMaximumSize attribute for the ant javac task.

property.name: maven.compile.optimize
property.label: maven.compile.optimize
property.description: Specifies whether source should be compiled with optimization; the default value is off. Used by the java:compile goal.

property.name: maven.compile.src.set
property.label: maven.compile.src.set
property.description: The source directories maven uses to compile java code.

property.name: maven.compile.source
property.label: maven.compile.source
property.description: Specifies the source version for the Java compiler. orresponds to the source attribute for the ant javac task. This value defaults to 1.3 so that builds on JDK 1.4 or later stil work on earlier JVMs. Valid values are 1.3, 1.4, 1.5.

property.name: maven.compile.target
property.label: maven.compile.target
property.description: Corresponds to the target attribute for the ant javac task. This value defaults to the Ant task default value.

property.name: maven.compile.verbose
property.label: maven.compile.verbose
property.description: Asks the compiler for verbose output. Corresponds to the verbose attribute for the ant javac task.
